page.title: 07LIVING AT MORWELLHAM
page.content: About 40 people live at Morwellham. {Mrs Ayres}lives at 18 Morwellham cottages.She has three daughters. It is very quiet and they don't get disturbed by visitors to the Centre. There are lots of coaches full of school children that come to visit Morwellham. {Lord Bradford}owns the cottages and they all have people living in them.Her house was once 2 small ones. The main problem is transport.There is only one bus a week to Tavistock and it is difficult to get supplies.If the river floods in winter they cannot get out as the road is covered. {Mrs Ayres}uses a Rayburn to cook on which uses wood and coke.There is little for teenagers to do. Mrs Ayres works as a cook at the weekends at a public house.
